attributes.action: Ensure individuals can exercise a right to retain their European citizenship
attributes.additional_details: Human Rights, Article 27 right to freely participate in the cultural life of the community.  Article 13 right to liberty of movement within the territory of a state. This petition sites that withdrawal of one`s European citizenship against one`s will is a violation of human rights.  This is in light of an undemocratic referendum which presented misinformation and withheld the right of 16 / 17 year old`s to vote on that which cannot realistically take effect until they are of legally voting age
attributes.background: This petition calls upon parliament to negotiate a European association which takes into account 48% of voters who do not wish to leave the European Union.   Ensuring individuals have the choice to retain European Citizenship and maintain their right to freely participate in their European community
